messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a pack of wire eating mammals have descended into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Service.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Israeli Embassy 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: How the bloody heck do I recall I'm not command screw this somebody grab the spare
